keyPolicies.policyDescription: Stop Brexit and build a brighter future.
Generate 80% of electricity from renewable sources by 2030, insulate all of Britain's homes by 2020, planting 60 million trees a year.
Investing £11 billion into mental health, reducing waiting times for young people to get treatment.
Corporation tax cuts, tax cut worth £1,000 a year for low and middle-income households.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Give every child the best start in life
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Give every child a fairer start in life by recruiting 20,000 more teachers, investing in our schools and colleges.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A vote for Labour could end up being a vote for Brexit. Don't risk it!

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit and build a brighter future. How you voted in this borough at the European Elections earlier this year.
issues.economy: Tax cut worth £1,000 a year for low and middle-income households.
issues.education: Give every child a fairer start in life by recruiting 20,000 more teachers, investing in our schools and colleges.
issues.environment: Tackle the climate emergency - Generate 80% of electricity from renewable sources by 2030, insulate all of Britain's homes by 2020, planting 60 million trees a year.
issues.health: Transform our mental health services - Investing £11 billion into mental health, reducing waiting times for young people to get treatment.
issues.lawCrime: A background in tackling knife crime in the area.

community.content: Bobby grew up on a council estate in South East London and knows how important it is to invest in housing and public services.

leaflet.personalStatement: Bobby Dean grew up on a council estate in South East London and knows how hard it is for people. He has a background in tackling knife crime in the area, having chaired a local council committee in the aftermath of the tragic loss of a young man in our community.

politicalExperience.achievements: Tackled knife crime after the tragic loss of a young man in the community.

contactInformation.address: Liberal Democrats, 8-10 Great George Street, London, SW1P 3AE
